metadata.feature_description: Configure whether comments require approval before publication for Blogs, Discussions, Ideas, Social Events, and Wiki modules.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Enable comment moderation for Blogs module

steps.action: Navigate to Community Settings > Settings tab
steps.expected: Comment Moderation section is visible with Blogs checkbox
steps.actual: Comment Moderation section displayed with Blogs checkbox visible and initially checked

steps.expected: Blogs checkbox responds to click and toggles state
steps.actual: Blogs checkbox successfully toggled - unchecked when clicked, re-checked when clicked again

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Disable comment moderation for Blogs module

steps.action: Click Blogs checkbox to uncheck it

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Enable comment moderation for Discussions module

steps.actual: Discussions checkbox successfully toggled between checked and unchecked states

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Disable comment moderation for Discussions module

steps.action: Click Discussions checkbox to uncheck it

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Enable comment moderation for Ideas module

steps.actual: Ideas checkbox successfully toggled between checked and unchecked states

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Disable comment moderation for Ideas module

steps.action: Click Ideas checkbox to uncheck it

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Enable comment moderation for Social Events module

steps.expected: Social Events checkbox responds to click
steps.actual: Social Events checkbox successfully toggled between checked and unchecked states

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Disable comment moderation for Social Events module

steps.action: Click Social Events checkbox to uncheck it

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Enable comment moderation for Wiki module

steps.actual: Wiki checkbox successfully toggled between checked and unchecked states

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Disable comment moderation for Wiki module

steps.action: Click Wiki checkbox to uncheck it

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Save all comment moderation settings and verify persistence

steps.action: Disable Blogs checkbox and click Save button
steps.actual: Settings saved successfully - 'Item successfully saved.' message appeared

steps.action: Navigate away to Site Settings and back to Community Settings
steps.actual: Blogs checkbox remained unchecked after navigating away and back, confirming persistence

steps.action: Re-enable Blogs and save to restore settings
steps.actual: All settings restored and saved successfully

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify default values (all false) for new installations

steps.action: Check initial state of Comment Moderation checkboxes
steps.expected: All checkboxes should have a default state
steps.actual: All Comment Moderation checkboxes (Blogs, Discussions, Ideas, Social Events, Wiki) were initially checked (enabled) in the test environment. Note: This is a pre-configured test environment, not a new installation.

observations: The Comment Moderation settings are located under Settings > Community > Miscellaneous Community Settings section
All five comment moderation checkboxes (Blogs, Discussions, Ideas, Social Events, Wiki) are functional and can be toggled independently
The Save button displays 'Item successfully saved.' notification upon successful save
Settings persist correctly after navigating away and returning to the Community Settings panel
The UI uses standard checkbox controls that are accessible and respond to click events
Initial values in this test environment were all enabled (checked), which may differ from default values in a fresh installation
